AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Adrian Almaguer: Attorney for Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya, whose performance is being questioned in relation to ineffective assistance of counsel claims
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nancy F. Atlas: Judge presiding over the case, who sentenced Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya and is reviewing his claim for relief
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: Defendant in a criminal case involving alien smuggling and hostage taking, sentenced to 292 months in prison, seeking relief from his sentence under Section 2255
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Guidelines Manu: Manual used for determining sentence, considering the most serious offense among multiple counts, under which Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya's sentence was calculated
